name: Atari Flashback Classics Switch
summary:
"The most comprehensive collection of arcade and home console classics comes to the Nintendo Switch. Packed with 150 all-time favorites, rare gems, and inimitable homebrews, Atari Flashback Classics SWITCH is designed to take advantage of the Nintendo console’s unique controls and functionality to bring new life to these iconic Atari games. 
 
With all-new achievements, leaderboards and social features bringing players together, combined with an amazing archive of classic artwork make Atari Flashback Classics Switch the most complete Atari collection ever!"

esrb.synopsis: This is a collection of 150 classic games from the arcade and Atari 2600 console. Some games contain highly pixilated depictions of players shooting down enemies/projectiles/planes from a first-person perspective. In Realsports Boxing, players control boxers that punch each other inside a ring; players win by knocking out their opponent. A few games allow players to wager in-game credits on games of blackjack and slots. The border for the game Poolshark depicts a character with a lit cigar in his mouth.

pegi.synopsis: The game was rated PEGI 12 for games that teach gambling. Not appropriate for persons below 12 years of age.
